concept.title: Create a new Dynamic Test Suite

conbody.p: To quickly create a new Dynamic Test Suite, click on a tag from the Workspace sidebar or the test case view.

image.alt: Click a tag from the workspace sidebar

conbody.p: An Execute test case dialog opens, showing all test cases of the selected tag.

image.alt: An execute test case dialog opens

conbody.p: Alternatively, you can also click Add (+) in the Dynamic Test Suite section from the Workspace sidebar to create a new Dynamic Test Suite.

image.alt: Create a new dynamic test suite manually
